Armor class is 10 of 10. 
Affects hp by 90. 
Affects mana by 100. 
Affects damage roll by 3. 
Affects hit roll by 2. 
Affects strength by 1. 
Affects wisdom by 1. 
Bonuses for 'The Mystic Armor of Nidaros', 4 pieces: 
Affects damage roll by 3. 
Affects mana by 20. 
Affects wisdom by 1. 
Affects dexterity by 1. 
Affects resistant:magic by 10%.

Hard and smooth, this piece of marble is nearly completely flat. It almost 
appears as though it were shaved off of the back of a statue or bust. With 
some imagination, and some more pieces of marble, it may be possible to 
reconstruct this item.

Made from once shimmering white marble, this altar looks to have been badly 
desecrated over the years. Large gouges have been cut into the stone, as 
though someone spent time prying out something from within the keyhole. From 
the design, it is clear that this altar was meant as a defensive structure, 
ensuring that those without the proper knowledge to gain entry did not do so.

The rounded oval circle that makes up the top portion of the altar has been 
damaged in the fall from its previous placement. A large crack runs across the 
base of the section, where it was once attached to another, larger portion of 
the altar.

You take a closer look at a heap of rotting corpses on the ground... 
Even the bitter cold of the ice troll's den cannot contain the stench of his 
larder... it seems that corpses have been dragged here, partially eaten, and 
abandoned. Human bones mingle with those of deer and insectoid frostcreepers 
that strayed too far from safety, all dripping with the rotting goo of 
unconsumed flesh.
